from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Triple:
    subject: str
    predicate: str
    object: str

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-START

# New replacement code
# New replacement code

def predict(triples: list[Triple]) -> str:
    subjects = {}
    predicates = {
        "cityServed": "serves the city of {}",
        "location": "is located in {}",
        "elevationAboveTheSeaLevel": "which is {} metres above sea level",
        "runwayLength": "and has a runway length of {} metres",
        "country": "in {}",
        "isPartOf": "which is part of {}",
        "language": "where the language spoken is {}",
        "capital": "where the capital is {}",
        "operatingOrganisation": "operated by {}",
        "nativeName": "also known as {}",
        "iataLocationIdentifier": "with the IATA code {}",
        "icaoLocationIdentifier": "and the ICAO code {}",
        "1stRunwaySurfaceType": "and has a 1st runway surface type of {}",
        "1stRunwayLengthFeet": "and has a 1st runway length of {} feet",
        "leader": "led by {}",
        "demonym": "with the demonym of {}",
        "order": "belonging to the order of {}",
        "class": "and belonging to the class of {}",
        "runwayName": "has a runway named {}",
        "elevationAboveTheSeaLevelInFeet": "which is {} feet above sea level",
        "elevationAboveTheSeaLevelInMetres": "which is {} metres above sea level",
        "2ndRunwaySurfaceType": "and has a 2nd runway surface type of {}",
        "3rdRunwaySurfaceType": "and has a 3rd runway surface type of {}",
        "runwaySurfaceType": "and has a runway surface type of {}",
        "officialLanguage": "with an official language of {}",
        "city": "located in the city of {}",
        "jurisdiction": "under the jurisdiction of {}",
        "currency": "with the currency of {}",
        "headquarter": "headquartered at {}",
        "hubAirport": "with a hub airport at {}",
        "aircraftFighter": "operating the {} fighter aircraft",
        "attackAircraft": "operating the {} attack aircraft",
        "battle": "involved in the {} battle",
        "5thRunwaySurfaceType": "and has a 5th runway surface type of {}",
        "countySeat": "which is the county seat of {}",
        "chief": "led by {}",
        "foundedBy": "founded by {}",
        "postalCode": "with a postal code of {}",
        "areaCode": "and an area code of {}",
        "foundingYear": "founded in the year {}",
        "ceremonialCounty": "in the ceremonial county of {}",
        "administrativeArrondissement": "in the administrative arrondissement of {}",
        "mayor": "with a mayor of {}",
        "largestCity": "with the largest city being {}",
        "4thRunwayLengthFeet": "and has a 4th runway length of {} feet",
        "1stRunwayNumber": "and has a 1st runway number of {}",
        "5thRunwayNumber": "and has a 5th runway number of {}",
    }

    for triple in triples:
        if triple.subject not in subjects:
            subjects[triple.subject] = []
        subjects[triple.subject].append((triple.predicate, triple.object))

    sentences = []
    for subject, triples_list in subjects.items():
        sentence = f"{subject} "
        for i, (predicate, obj) in enumerate(triples_list):
            if predicate in predicates:
                sentence += predicates[predicate].format(obj)
                if i < len(triples_list) - 1:
                    sentence += ", "
        sentences.append(sentence)

    airport_info = []
    country_info = []
    for sentence in sentences:
        if "serves the city of" in sentence:
            airport_info.append(sentence)
        elif "in" in sentence and "serves" not in sentence:
            country_info.append(sentence)

    result_sentence = ""
    if airport_info:
        result_sentence += airport_info[0]
        for sentence in airport_info[1:]:
            result_sentence += f", {sentence}"
    if country_info:
        if result_sentence:
            result_sentence += f", {country_info[0]}"
        else:
            result_sentence += country_info[0]
        for sentence in country_info[1:]:
            result_sentence += f", {sentence}"

    if not result_sentence:
        if sentences:
            result_sentence = sentences[0]
            for sentence in sentences[1:]:
                result_sentence += f", {sentence}"

    return result_sentence + "."

You are an expert data engineer specializing in converting data to text. You will be given the current Python program with its BLUE score and an inspiration program and your task will be to evolve the current Python program to improve the score. It is a program that converts a list of triples into natural language text. The given triples will be associated with the topic: Airport. The program must implement a function called 'predict' that accepts a list of triples and generates a coherent, contextually relevant sentence that accurately represents the information contained in the triples. Ensure that the generated text is fluent, grammatically correct, and maintains the meaning of the original data. There can be multiple triples given that make up a complex sentence. Converting all those triples into one sentence will award greater score. An example of a complex sentence:
Triples:
(Antwerp | cityServed | Antwerp International Airport)
(Belgium | country | Antwerp)
(City of Brussels | capital | Belgium)
Example sentence:
"Antwerp International Airport serves the city of Antwerp which is in Belgium, where the capital is Brussels."

The 'predict' function returns that sentence as a string. Below is the list of all possible predicates that can be given as an input. With the given predicates and example triples implement the 'predict' function so it can process all the possible predicates:

from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Triple:
    subject: str
    predicate: str
    object: str

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-START

def predict(triples: list[Triple]) -> str:
    subjects = {}
    for triple in triples:
        if triple.subject not in subjects:
            subjects[triple.subject] = []
        subjects[triple.subject].append((triple.predicate, triple.object))

    sentences = []
    for subject, triples_list in subjects.items():
        sentence = f"{subject}"
        predicates_handled = set()
        triples_list.sort(key=lambda x: x[0])
        for i, (predicate, obj) in enumerate(triples_list):
            if predicate in predicates_handled:
                continue
            predicates_handled.add(predicate)
            if predicate == "cityServed":
                sentence += f" serves the city of {obj}"
            elif predicate == "location":
                sentence += f" is located in {obj}"
            elif predicate == "elevationAboveTheSeaLevel":
                sentence += f" which is {obj} metres above sea level"
            elif predicate == "runwayLength":
                sentence += f" and has a runway length of {obj} metres"
            elif predicate == "country":
                sentence += f" in {obj}"
            elif predicate == "isPartOf":
                sentence += f" which is part of {obj}"
            elif predicate == "language":
                sentence += f" where the language spoken is {obj}"
            elif predicate == "capital":
                sentence += f" where the capital is {obj}"
            elif predicate == "nativeName":
                sentence += f" also known as {obj}"
            elif predicate == "iataLocationIdentifier":
                sentence += f" with the IATA code {obj}"
            elif predicate == "icaoLocationIdentifier":
                sentence += f" and the ICAO code {obj}"
            elif predicate == "operatingOrganisation":
                sentence += f" operated by {obj}"
            elif predicate == "leader":
                sentence += f" led by {obj}"
            elif predicate == "owner":
                sentence += f" owned by {obj}"
            elif predicate == "leaderParty":
                sentence += f" with the leader party of {obj}"
            elif predicate == "regionServed":
                sentence += f" with the region served of {obj}"
            if i < len(triples_list) - 1:
                sentence += ", "
        sentences.append(sentence)

    airport_info = []
    country_info = []
    for sentence in sentences:
        if "serves the city of" in sentence:
            airport_info.append(sentence)
        elif "in" in sentence and "serves" not in sentence:
            country_info.append(sentence)

    result_sentence = ""
    if airport_info:
        result_sentence += airport_info[0]
        for sentence in airport_info[1:]:
            result_sentence += f", {sentence}"
    if country_info:
        if result_sentence:
            result_sentence += f", {country_info[0]}"
        else:
            result_sentence += country_info[0]
        for sentence in country_info[1:]:
            result_sentence += f", {sentence}"

    if not result_sentence:
        if sentences:
            result_sentence = sentences[0]
            for sentence in sentences[1:]:
                result_sentence += f", {sentence}"

    return result_sentence + "."

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-END
